@AlbumenJ 
still wondering...
why JdkCompiler.java  be CRLF but JdkCompilerTest.java be LF?
please consider do a unify...
Please feel free to reopen.
Please check #7239.
we will also fix it in 2.6.10

Thanks for contribution. 

We are moving spi extensions to apache/dubbo-spi-extensions, pls., submit the Gson extension to there.

The `providers:com.test.TestService::staging` format looks like the traditional service model in 2.7.x.
I think it's better to fix it in 2.7.x first, please submit a pr to the master branch.

I am a bit confused here.  Most of the time `status -l` should be used to monitor the status of the Dubbo provider threadpool. What's the meaning of showing the pool of the Consumer consuming MonitorService?

I can't reproduce this issue in my environment.According to the appearance of NullPointerException of the method "sayHello" of DemoServiceComponent,it seems like it is a problem that you can't get a bean named "demoServiceComponent" from the Spring container.
You can try following steps:
      1.check if the maven dependency of spring in the external libarary ,mine is 5.2.8.If your version is wrong,maybe it is  a bug of ide.And you can try to refresh the maven.
      2.you can set a breakpoint after the consumer invoke the method sayHello,and put your debug stack trace here.

yes, `status -l` is use to monitor the status of the dubbo provider thread pool. but dubbo monitor haven't mark it self as consumer, so it override the provider thread pool data. finally, we got the wrong data.

pls fix ut

LGTM.
在定义一个异常类，在provider端抛出即可透传到consumer（异常类定义在公共项目中，provider和consumer都要包含这个项目）。

> 在定义一个异常类，在provider端抛出即可透传到consumer（异常类定义在公共项目中，provider和consumer都要包含这个项目）。

难道  Exception  不行吗, 非要自定义一个异常类吗
也可以，但为保险起见需要自定义，不然可能因为依赖问题consumer找不到对应的异常类。

> 也可以，但为保险起见需要自定义，不然可能因为依赖问题consumer找不到对应的异常类。

Failed to invoke the method registerUser in the service UserService. Tried 1 times of the providers [192.168.62.224:80] (1/1) from the registry a010252:8848 on the consumer 192.168.62.224 using the dubbo version 2.7.8. Last error is: Failed to invoke remote service: interface UserService, method: registerUser, cause: HTTP 500 Internal Server Error
用dubbo协议

> 用dubbo协议

就是用rest协议 呀, 用dubbo协议 就没有这个事了

Hi @XenoAmess Thank you for the contribution. We have reviewed and merged some of your pull requests recently. However, all the changes are code reformats which do not match the overall evolve plan of the community and will bring us a lot of conflicts and verifications.

I think it will be better for us to focus on such refactoring when we arrive at a certain stage. We have labeled all PR as `reopen later` so that we can review these PRs later.

Please feel free to let us know if you have any questions.
截图中配制列表中的是元数据信息, 服务没注册上应该是因为nacos开启了鉴权. 请检查配制是否正确. 如果能确定是BUG,请提供更多信息以便复现

图1中的是dubbo 配制中心和元数据中心的数据, 如果不希望写到nacos中,可以通过如下配制(dubbo spring boot)指定到zookeeper:
```
dubbo:
  metadata-report:
    address: nacos://127.0.0.1:8848
    group: DEFAULT_GROUP
  config-center:
    address: nacos://127.0.0.1:8848
    group: DEFAULT_GROUP
```
图2中是dubbo 接口级的注册信息.

Hi @konanok 
Is the problem still exists?
If so, can you re-upload your demo project?
&READY-TO-CLOSE&
close #7173 via #7174

I am sorry, I think we cannot accept this pull request for the following reasons:
1. Changes for different purposes mixed together
2. Dubbo works the opposite way this pr is going, instead of the provider following the serialization type received from the network, the serialization type is determined by the provider.

The serialization type from the network is not reliable, in the latest 2.7.9 release, we check the serialization type before deserialization. 
https://github.com/apache/dubbo/blob/f0483b80a32e813a4393879744e30d0084c3eafd/dubbo-remoting/dubbo-remoting-api/src/main/java/org/apache/dubbo/remoting/transport/CodecSupport.java#L161

Hi, @stonelion many thanks to you for having raised this issue. It's been fixed by #7109, please help to check it works as expected. 

Please let us know if there's any problem with the patch.

@XenoAmess 

> still wondering...
> why JdkCompiler.java be CRLF but JdkCompilerTest.java be LF?
> please consider do a unify...

There are some file is in CRLF mode due to history problem. 

In our opinion, if we do a unify for those files in `CRLF` mode, the git blame will not work properly. 

Also, we cannot find if the file is in CRLF mode only from Github Pull Request website and it is sure that the files in the future PR  in CRLF mode is unavoidable.

So, we choose we tolerate multi file formats and we have add `.gitattributes` file for this repo to make sure new contributors will not modify file format.

Thanks for your understanding.

> Also, we cannot find if the file is in CRLF mode only from Github Pull Request website and it is sure that the files in the future PR in CRLF mode is unavoidable.

This can be done using checkstyle plugin.

We can fail the build when there be CRLF file.

See example at commons-lang.

https://github.com/apache/commons-lang/blob/master/pom.xml#L754

https://github.com/apache/commons-lang/blob/master/src/site/resources/checkstyle/checkstyle.xml#L28

> There are some file is in CRLF mode due to history problem.

Yeah, history problems are really awful things...

通过设置targetType伪装为一个普通bean从而可以避免提前初始化，但在实际初始化时还是根据beanClass生成ReferenceBean，也不影响正常初始化。但这个方法可能不是很可靠，有可能在以后某个Spring版本失效。
另外，这个方法不能解决autowire by name的方式提前初始化。
曾经遇到一个案例，在应用启动时，强依赖dubbo reference bean，而此时外部属性配置(如disconf/apollo)还没加载，出现属性注入失败的问题。

- I think that the definition of the ReferenceClientMap means that it makes sense to cache the ReferenceClient.
So most of the time the ReferenceClient will be found in the cache without triggering a lock operation.
Does it make sense to keep a locker in memory for rarely triggered operations?


- On the other hand. The most time consuming step is `buildReferenceCountExchangeClient`.
So the only operation in `synchronized (referenceClientMap)` is `put the PENDING_OBJECT` .
And then `buildReferenceCountExchangeClient` after  jump out of the loop and release the lock(synchronized).
It's my view that using synchronized for referenceClientMap here will reduce very few of concurrent.

vs #6793: reduce the memory usage
vs #6102: only reduce a few of concurrent
